articles.title: IPL 2024: Gautam Gambhir was pivotal in KKR retaining Andre Russell and Sunil Narine, says Tom Moody - India Today
articles.description: Former Australia all-rounder Tom Moody has said that Gautam Gambhir was pivotal in Kolkata Knight Riders retaining Andre Russell and Sunil Narine for the 2024 season of the Indian Premier League.
articles.content:
